title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.21 - Eligible uses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 4243.21 - Eligible uses

State Regulations
(a) Program
funds for infrastructure development financing projects may be used for: (1)
construction or renovation of basic
systems and facilities on public or privately-owned property including drainage
systems, sewer systems, access roads, sidewalks, docks, parking, wharves, water
supply systems, and site clearance, preparation, improvements and
demolition; (2)
soft costs related
to any of the above uses; and
(3)
preliminary planning for uses permitted under paragraph (a)(1) of this
section. (b) Program
funds for infrastructure development financing may not be used for any
ineligible costs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
4243.21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
